title: I’m Tired of Letting My Past Ruin My Future
description:
On today’s show, we talk with:
- A man dealing with past trauma who’s at risk of losing his marriage. (1:16)
- A woman plagued with mom-guilt. (23:55)
- A son trying to understand why his relationship with his mom feels impossible. (41:36)

Lyrics of the Day: "Friday I'm in Love" - The Cure
Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
 Support Our Sponsors:

BetterHelp

DreamCloud

Churchill Mortgage

Resources:
